name: Super Mario Fangame: Bowser and The Dark World
name_original: Super Mario Fangame: Bowser and The Dark World
description:
You play as Mario, and you start off in Bowser and The Dark World, from Mario 64!      (At least that is what it's based off of). And your main objective is to make it to the end! On your way, you can collect coins and stomp on Goombas! Unfortunately, Mario had a koopa clown car accident and broke his leg, so you'll be taking the stairs this time around! 

All rights to Nintendo.
